author: Reuters Editorial
title: South Korean police to question KT Corp chairman over suspicious payments to lawmakers
text:
SEOUL (Reuters) - South Korean telecom company KT Corpâ€™s ( 030200.KS ) chairman will be questioned on Tuesday over suspected breaches of political funding laws, police said.
Police said they are investigating suspicious payments amounting to about $400,000 from former and current KT executives and employees to about 90 members of parliament between 2014-2017.
A spokeswoman for KT Chairman Hwang Chang-kyu could not be immediately reached.
($1 = 1,070.6600 won)
Reporting by Joyce Lee, Dahee Kim; Editing by Stephen Coates
